communityrequests-wish-loading-error: Error message shown when loading the form.
communityrequests-form-subtitle: Introductory text at the top of the form.
communityrequests-wish-not-found:
Error message shown when a wish is not found.

Parameters:
* $1 — the page title of the wish that was not found
communityrequests-focus-area-not-found:
Error message shown when a focus area is not found.

Parameters:
* $1 — the page title of the focus area that was not found
communityrequests-intake-focus-area: Label for the focus area field in the Special:WishlistIntake form.
communityrequests-title-label:
Form field label for the wish or focus area title.
{{Identical|Title}}
communityrequests-title-error:
Error message shown when the title is not of the correct length.

Parmaeters:
* $1 — minimum number of characters
* $2 — maximum number of characters
communityrequests-description-error:
Error message shown when the description isn't long enough.

Parameters:
*$1 — minimum number of characters
communityrequests-wishtype-feature-label: Radio button and table cell label for wishes of type 'feature'.
communityrequests-wishtype-bug-label: Radio button and table cell label for wishes of type 'bug'.
communityrequests-wishtype-change-label: Radio button and table cell label for wishes of type 'change'.
communityrequests-wishtype-unknown-label: Radio button label for wishes with no type assigned.
Short version of {{msg-mw|communityrequests-wishtype-unknown-label}}, for use in table cells.
communityrequests-wishtype-error: Error message shown when no radio button is selected.
communityrequests-project-show-less: Label for button with which to collapse the project list.
communityrequests-project-show-all: Label for button with which to show the full project list.
communityrequests-project-other-error:
Error message shown when the value in the other-project field isn't long enough.

Parameters:
*$1 — minimum number of characters
communityrequests-project-no-selection:
Error message shown when no project has been selected.

Parameters
*$1 —  minimum number of projects that need to be selected
*$2 — the 'other projects' label, as defined in {{msg-mw|communityrequests-project-other-label}}
communityrequests-audience-error:
Error message shown when the audience field is not of the correct length.

Parmaeters:
* $1 — minimum number of characters
* $2 — maximum number of characters
communityrequests-phabricator-chip-desc: Aria description added to each Phabricator task ID chip.
communityrequests-create-success: Success message shown in the post-edit banner after a new wish has been created.
communityrequests-edit-success: Success message shown in the post-edit banner after an existing wish has been saved.
communityrequests-focus-area-create-succ: Success message shown in the post-edit banner after a new focus area has been created.
communityrequests-focus-area-edit-succes: Success message shown in the post-edit banner after an existing focus area has been saved.
communityrequests-view-all-wishes: Link text for the link back to the 'all wishes' page.
communityrequests-view-all-focus-areas: Link text for the link back to the 'all focus areas' page.
communityrequests-close: Image alt text for the close icon shown on the post-edit banner.
communityrequests-publish: Form submission button label for new wishes.
communityrequests-save: Form submission button label for existing wishes.
communityrequests-support-dialog-title:
Title of voting dialog window.

Parameters:
* $1 – Title of the wish or focus area.
communityrequests-support-focus-area: Button label for the voting button on focus area pages.
communityrequests-support-focus-area-con: Message shown after voting for a focus area.
communityrequests-support-wish:
{{Doc-important|“Support” is a verb, referring to supporting this wish.'''}}

Button label for the voting button on wish pages.
communityrequests-support-wish-confirmed: Message shown after voting for a focus area.
communityrequests-optional-comment: Form field label in the voting dialog window.
communityrequests-support: Primary button label in the voting dialog window. It describes an action: "Express support for a wish, vote for a wish".
communityrequests-supported: Button label shown on the (disabled) voting button if someone's already voted.
communityrequests-unsupport-focus-area: Button label on the button with which to remove a vote.
communityrequests-error-required-fields:
Error message for required fields.

Parameters:
* $1 — List of missing fields
*$2 - total number of missing fields
communityrequests-status: Label for the 'Status' field in the intake form.
communityrequests-status-submitted: Label for a status chip. An adjective or a passive participle that describes a wish.
communityrequests-status-open: Label for a status chip. An adjective or a passive participle that describes a wish.
communityrequests-status-in-progress: Label for a status chip. An adjective or a passive participle that describes a wish.
communityrequests-status-delivered: Label for a status chip. An adjective or a passive participle that describes a wish.
communityrequests-status-blocked: Label for a status chip. An adjective or a passive participle that describes a wish.
communityrequests-status-archived: Label for a status chip. An adjective or a passive participle that describes a wish.
communityrequests-status-under-review: Label for a status chip. Status for wishes/focus areas that are being reviewed.
communityrequests-status-unsupported: Label for a status chip. Status for wishes/focus areas that are unsupported.
communityrequests-status-declined: Label for a status chip. Status for wishes/focus areas that have been declined.
communityrequests-status-community-oppor: Label for a status chip. Status for wishes/focus areas that are a community opportunity.
communityrequests-status-long-term-oppor: Label for a status chip. Status for wishes/focus areas that are a long-term opportunity.
communityrequests-status-near-term-oppor: Label for a status chip. Status for wishes/focus areas that are a near-term opportunity.
communityrequests-status-prioritized: Label for a status chip. Status for wishes/focus areas that are prioritized.
communityrequests-status-done: Label for a status chip. Status for wishes/focus areas that are done.
communityrequests-edit-wish: Label for button to open a wish for editing.
communityrequests-discuss-wish: Label for button/link to a wish's talk page.
communityrequests-wish-description-headi: Heading for the 'description' section of wish pages. Similar to {{msg-mw|communityrequests-description}} which is used on the form field for the same content.
communityrequests-wish-focus-area-headin: Heading for the 'focus area' section of wish pages.
communityrequests-wish-type-heading: Heading for the 'type' section of wish pages. Similar to {{msg-mw|communityrequests-wishtype-label}} which is used on the form field for the same content.
communityrequests-wish-related-heading: Heading for the 'related projects' section of wish pages. Similar to {{msg-mw|communityrequests-project-intro}} which is used on the form field for the same content.
communityrequests-wish-audience-heading: Heading for the 'affected users' section of wish pages. Similar to {{msg-mw|communityrequests-audience-label}} which is used on the form field for the same content.
communityrequests-wish-phabricator-headi: Heading for the 'Phabricator tasks' section of wish pages. Similar to {{msg-mw|communityrequests-phabricator-label}} which is used on the form field for the same content.
communityrequests-wish-other-details-hea: Heading for the 'other details' section of wish pages, containing dates, author, etc.
communityrequests-wish-created:
Label for a wish's date and time of creation.

Parameters:
* $1 — Date and time of creation, formatted in the user's preferred date format.
communityrequests-wish-updated:
Label for a wish's date and time of last update.

Parameters:
* $1 — Date and time of last update, formatted in the user's preferred date format.
communityrequests-wish-proposer:
Label for a wish's proposer (linked username and talk page link).

Parameters:
* $1 — The proposer's username, formatted with {{msg-mw|signature}}.
communityrequests-wish-voting: Section heading on the wish page.
communityrequests-wish-voting-info:
Descriptive text in the voting section of a wish page.

Parameters:
* $1 — Formatted number of supporters.
* $2 — Unformatted integer number of supporters, to determine plural grammar.
communityrequests-wish-voting-info-open: Descriptive text in the voting section of a wish page, shown when the wish is open for voting.
communityrequests-wish-voting-info-close: Descriptive text in the voting section of a wish page, shown when the wish is closed for voting.
communityrequests-wish-voting-not-logged: Warning shown instead of the voting button when a user is not logged in and so cannot vote.
communityrequests-wish-voters-heading: Section heading shown above the votes list on a wish page.
communityrequests-wish-no-votes: Text shown when there are no votes for a wish.
communityrequests-wishes-table-caption: Caption for the table of wishes on the 'all wishes' page.
communityrequests-wishes-status-header: Table column header for the 'status' column.
communityrequests-wishes-type-header: Table column header for the 'type' column.
communityrequests-wishes-title-header: Table column header for the 'title' column.
communityrequests-wishes-focusarea-heade: Table column header for the 'focus area' column.
communityrequests-wishes-projects-header: Table column header for the 'projects' column.
communityrequests-wishes-votecount-heade: Table column header for the 'vote count' column.
communityrequests-wishes-created-header: Table column header for the 'created' date column.
communityrequests-wishes-updated-header: Table column header for the 'updated' date column.
communityrequests-focus-area-unassigned: Label shown for wishes that have no focus area assigned yet.
communityrequests-form-loading: Text shown while the wish form loads.
communityrequests-form-loading-1: First help message shown while the wish form loads (to help if the form never loads).
communityrequests-form-loading-2:
Second help message shown while the wish form loads.

Parameters:
* $1 — Wikitext link to help page.
communityrequests-please-log-in: Notice text shown if a user is not logged in when they try to open in the wish form.
communityrequests-focus-area-description:
Label for the focus area description field in the intake form, as well as the heading for the description section on focus area pages.
{{Identical|Description}}
Description for the focus area description field in the intake form.
communityrequests-focus-area-short-descr: Label for the focus area short description field in the intake form.
Description for the focus area short description field in the intake form.
communityrequests-focus-area-supported: Label for number of supporters of a focus area.
communityrequests-focus-area-supported-v:
Value for number of supporters.

Parameters:
* $1 — Formatted number of supporters.
* $2 — Unformatted integer number of supporters, to determine plural grammar.
communityrequests-focus-area-owners-labe: Label for the list of owners of a focus area.
communityrequests-focus-area-view-wishes: Link text shown on focus area cards, linking to the focus area's page.
communityrequests-focus-area-wishes-list: Link text shown on focus area cards, linking to the focus area's page.
communityrequests-focus-area-wishes-desc: Description of the focus area wishes list on a focus area page.
Description of the focus area wishes list on a focus area page.
Description of the focus area wishes list on a focus area page.
communityrequests-focus-area-th-wish: Table header on the wish table on a focus area page.
communityrequests-focus-area-stakeholder: Section heading on the focus area page.
communityrequests-focus-area-owners: Label in the stakeholders section of the focus area page.
communityrequests-focus-area-owners-desc: Description of the focus area owners field in the intake form.
communityrequests-focus-area-owners-plac: Placeholder text for the focus area owners field in the intake form.
communityrequests-focus-area-volunteers: Label in the stakeholders section of the focus area page.
communityrequests-focus-area-volunteers-: Description of the focus area volunteers field in the intake form.
Placeholder text for the focus area volunteers field in the intake form.
communityrequests-focus-area-voting: Section heading on the focus area page.
communityrequests-focus-area-voting-info:
Descriptive text in the voting section of the focus area page.

Parameters:
* $1 — Formatted number of supporters.
* $2 — Unformatted integer number of supporters, to determine plural grammar.
Descriptive text in the voting section of the focus area page, shown when the focus area is open for voting.
Descriptive text in the voting section of a focus area page, shown when the focus area is closed for voting.
communityrequests-focus-area-voting-not-: Warning shown instead of the voting button when a user is not logged in and so cannot vote.
communityrequests-focus-area-voters-head: Section heading shown above the votes list on a focus area page.
communityrequests-focus-area-no-votes: Text shown when there are no votes for a focus area.
communityrequests-translation-translatab:
Banner message shown when untranslated text is found in a page.

Parameter:

* $1 — The localized name of the current interface language.
communityrequests-translation-switch: Label for the toggle switch to enable/disable the machine translation.
communityrequests-translation-progress:
Text shown under a progress bar while a page is being translated, telling the user how much has been translated so far.

Parameters:

* $1 — The count of already-translated elements.
* $2 — The total count of translatable elements.
communityrequests-translation-errors: Label shown above a list of errors, if any errors occur during translation.
communityrequests-disabled: Error message shown when the Community Wishlist is disabled.
communityrequests-publish-wish-summary:
Edit summary for new wishes made using [[Special:WishlistIntake]] or API.

Parameters:
* $1 — The title of the wish that was published.
communityrequests-save-wish-summary:
Edit summary for existing wishes that were edited using [[Special:WishlistIntake]] or API.

Parameters:
* $1 — The title of the wish that was saved.
communityrequests-publish-focus-area-sum:
Edit summary for new focus areas made using [[Special:FocusAreaIntake]] or API.

Parameters:
* $1 — The title of the focus area that was published.
communityrequests-save-focus-area-summar:
Edit summary for existing focus areas that were edited using [[Special:FocusAreaIntake]] or API.

Parameters:
* $1 — The title of the focus area that was saved.
communityrequests-category:
{{tracking category name}}
Name of [[mw:Help:Tracking categories|tracking category]] to list all Wishlist-related pages.
communityrequests-support-label: Label shown at the beginning of the voting entry to indicate that the user is supporting a wish or focus area.
communityrequests-error-category:
{{tracking category name}}
Name of [[mw:Help:Tracking categories|tracking category]] to list wishes and focus areas that contain errors.
communityrequests-error-category-desc: Description on [[Special:TrackingCategories]] for the {{msg-mw|communityrequests-error-category}} tracking category.
communityrequests-wish-category:
{{tracking category name}}
Name of [[mw:Help:Tracking categories|tracking category]] to list all wishes.
communityrequests-wish-category-desc: Description on [[Special:TrackingCategories]] for the {{msg-mw|communityrequests-wish-category}} tracking category.
communityrequests-focus-area-category:
{{tracking category name}}
Name of [[mw:Help:Tracking categories|tracking category]] to list all focus areas.
communityrequests-focus-area-category-de: Description on [[Special:TrackingCategories]] for the {{msg-mw|communityrequests-focus-area-category}} tracking category.
tag-community-wishlist:
Short description of the community-wishlist tag.

Shown on lists of changes (history, recentchanges, etc.) for each edit made using Community Wishlist software.
communityrequests-cant-manually-edit:
Error message shown when a user tries to manually edit a wish or focus area, but does not have the right to do so.

Parameters:
* $1 — The title of the Special page which should be used instead.
communityrequests-missing-wish:
Message shown when attempting to access a wish that does not exist. This can happen if a wish is deleted and clients are not made aware of this.

Parameters:
* $1 — The page title to create a new wish.
communityrequests-missing-focus-area:
Message shown when attempting to access a focus area that does not exist. This can happen if a focus area is deleted and clients are not made aware of this.

Parameters:
* $1 — The page title to create a new focus area.
